duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate complex and class action litigation, mainly focused on the rights of vulnerable immigrant groups.
Demonstrate commitment to social justice and the practice of law in the public interest.
Expertise in constitutional law, immigration law, and/or federal litigation.
Work full-time at the program’s office in Los Angeles.

education_certification.credential: Member of the California Bar with 3-5 years of experience in complex or class action litigation.
